title: Deeply saddened by Naeem-ul-Haq’s demise: Qureshi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 15 (APP):Minister for Foreign Affairs Shah Mahmood Qureshi Saturday said that he was deeply saddened by the demise of founding member of Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) Naeem-ul-Haq who died of cancer in Karachi.
In a tweet, the foreign minister said that late Naeem-ul-Haq had fought cancer with true grit and determination and that his commitment to the party and services to PTI were invaluable.
“He was a great friend and shall be missed. May his soul rest in peace,” he prayed.
